page.title: 18TRANSPORT
page.content: In a survey of our school families it was discovered that only 2% of those families participating, had no car.The high percentage of cars owned in the village,98% was due to the inadequate bus service. 60% owned one car per family while a further 30% owned two cars and as many people work out of the village, this is hardly surprising.It is unusual, however,that 8% own three or more cars. The inconvenience of the bus service is torture.If you wish to go to the public baths or shopping out of Letham you have to plan it ahead carefully or you could miss the buses which sometimes fail to stop.We are all hoping that our bus service improves soon.
